channel.title: observations on Austin Delamar
channel.description: Recent content in observations on Austin Delamar

item.title: Exciting Trends in Web Technology
item.description: Web tech is so fricken exciting right now. Offline-First Web Development Single Page Apps Responsive Web Design Progressive Web Apps Full Stack JavaScript Docker Containerization Microservices Serverless FaaS Apps Blockchain None of these technologies are new in a sense.

item.title: JavaScript Dependent Websites
item.description: I want to start a new series where I highlight some popular websites that require JavaScript. This will be my first entry on this topic, so the formatting may change a bit in future posts. For now, I want to show off a few sites, in no particular order, that depend on JavaScript (JS) to perform their basic function: Display.
